channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: What's next for Mehul Choksi after Belgium has cleared his extradition?
Are India’s Diwali fireworks choking Pakistan?
The story of ‘cursed’ diamond left behind in Louvre heist and its India connection
How OpenAI’s ChatGPT Atlas browser will be different from Chrome and others
Meet the brave 6 Operation Sindoor heroes awarded the Vir Chakra
Why Trump has cancelled his talks with Putin in Budapest
Who pulled off the Louvre crown jewel heist?
item.description: French investigators have to live down the legacy of not only the fictional Inspector Clouseau but also the ‘gentleman jewel thief’ Arsene Lupin

item.title: Beyond light and darkness: Secularisation of Diwali is an assault on Bharatiya civilisation
item.description: How secularisation of Hindu festivals is a slow poison to Bharatiya identity

item.title: Indo-Pacific's summit season is on: How the region will manage Trump factor
item.description: The paradox of Donald Trump’s Indo-Pacific diplomacy is that his presence is unpredictable, his absence consequential, and his impact uncertain

item.title: Ceasefire under fire: Gaza peace efforts falter amid new Israel-Hamas clashes
item.description: Fear and panic are again dominating the scene among people in Gaza after Israel’s military launched more than 20 airstrikes

item.title: How India–Canada quietly steer through Trumpian storm
item.description: The departure of Justin Trudeau as Canadian prime minister and the return of Donald Trump as US president prompted Canada to accelerate its search for allies in Europe and Asia—making a renewed focus on ties with India both strategic and inevitable

item.title: Why Deoband should be kept away from India-Taliban engagement
item.description: The government, with its diplomatic and intelligence apparatus, is competent enough to engage with the Taliban; engaging Deoband will add unnecessary complexities.
